players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm sorry to hear Diana was killed last night. We need to be cautious and try to figure out who the mafia is before it's too late."
Bob: "This is terrible about Diana. Charlie, you jumped in pretty quick there - did you have any suspicions about her yesterday? We need to work together on this."
You: "I know who the mafia is. Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now before he kills again."
You: "I have concrete proof from my investigation that Bob is the mafia. We can't afford to waste time doubting—let's vote him out now to protect the town."

Bob: "Alice, that's a very bold claim to make with zero evidence. If you were the detective, why didn't you speak up in the first round? This sudden accusation feels like a desperate mafia play to me."
Charlie: "Alice, if you are truly the detective, why didn't you reveal your role earlier to help us protect Diana? Your sudden accusation now seems suspicious."
